title: Is Gnar connected to Vastaya
body: I'm pretty sure that Gnar and Rakan both have the skulls of the same bird species so does this mean gnar  is from Vastaya

replies.body:
Gnar is a prehistoric yordle

If you've read the Vastaya lore, they're chimeric beings, aka part human part animal

Gnar is very clearly, a yordle, small, cute and fluffy, albeit dangerous when mad

often Splash arts =/= lore related

Based on the available lore, Gnar is a "primitive yordle", so would be much more closely related to the likes of Teemo, Rumble and Tristana, for example. Even when looking at the "Regions" tab in the "Universe" section, Bandle City (the home of the Yordles) is listed as a separate region to Ionia, which is the homeland of the Vastaya.
